channel.title: Jail command

item.title: Jail command
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

There is no real jail command for the old silab servers, only delta+ got them.

Although, i do have one for the silab servers, if you want it.
it will work but might not as they don’t handle the code.

Read full topic

item.title: Jail command
item.dc:creator: @zachrida zachrida
item.description:
@zachrida wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“jail”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) {
String name = command.substring(5);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.teleportToX = 3226;
c.teleportToY = 3407;
c.teleblock = true;
c.sendMessage(“You have been thrown in jail for breaking the rules!”);
c.sendMessage(“A mod or Admin will release you if they feel like it!”);
c.teleblock = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

else if (command.startsWith(“unjail”) && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 1) {
String name = command.substring(7);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.teleportToX = 3253;
c.teleportToY = 3431;
c.teleblock = false;
c.sendMessage(“Ahhh!feel the fresh air!Do not break the rules again!.”);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

Read full topic

item.title: Jail command
item.dc:creator: @Cyanidesuicide Cyanidesuicide
item.description:
@Cyanidesuicide wrote:

I have looked around but I could not find any working jail commands that suited my likings. There was one but it only jailed the play and did not tele block or unjail them. I would be really greatful is someone can give me a working Jail and unjail command.

Here is the previous one i tried.

[code]if (command.startsWith(“jail”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) {
String name = command.substring(5);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.teleportToX = 3226;
c.teleportToY = 3407;
c.teleblock = true;
c.sendMessage(“You have been thrown in jail for breaking the rules!”);
c.sendMessage(“A mod or Admin will release you if they feel like it!”);
c.teleblock = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

else if (command.startsWith(“unjail”) && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 1) {
String name = command.substring(7);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.teleportToX = 3253;
c.teleportToY = 3431;
c.teleblock = false;
c.sendMessage(“Ahhh!feel the fresh air!Do not break the rules again!.”);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}[/code]

Read full topic
